CustomField.formula: IF( Pricing_Factors_to_be_Applied__c, Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c * (1 + Quote.Applied_Cumulative_Indexation__c) * (1 + Quote.Applied_Upcoming_Indexation__c) * (1 + Quote.Price_Uplift_on_Renewal_percentage__c), IF( Pricing_Factors_to_be_Applied__c = FALSE,MAX(Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c,Sales_Price_ARR_One_off__c),Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c) )
CustomField.label: Base Price ARR/One-off
